name: flogo-lp-rest
title: REST uri-pass through
description: HTTP Method uri-part pass through activity

settings.name: method
settings.description: The HTTP method to invoke; Passed down from trigger then select TRIGGER

settings.name: useEnvProp
settings.description: If YES, then the input param envPropUri is used for the [schema://hostname:port/initialPart] of the uri; uri is concat behind the envPropUri

settings.name: uri
settings.description: The URI of the service to invoke; use /:restOfThePath to replace with incoming path

settings.name: proxy
settings.description: The address of the proxy server to be use

properties.name: useSystemCert
properties.description: Use the systems root certificate file

properties.name: certFile
properties.description: Path to PEM encoded client certificate

properties.name: keyFile
properties.description: Path to PEM encoded client key

properties.name: caFile
properties.description: Path to PEM encoded root certificates file

input.name: content
input.description: The message content to send. This is only used in POST, PUT, and PATCH

input.name: envPropUri
input.description: To push the environment property for the uri to use (schema://hostname:port/partialUrl)
